name: Thief Simulator Robbery Game
description:
This is a thief simulator story game. You can start your journey as a thief survivalist by robbing the most secure houses and banks.
Stealth game consists of many missions. You learn robbery techniques before to loot the most expensive items and jewelry.
You first buy lockpicks and many other tools for big heist. Complete Missions by Loot cash, jewelry home appliances and other valuable items from the houses.

You can steal valuable goods from hotels and houses. You should learn robbery from street criminals. Buy burglar tools from the market. You loot as a spy and beware of bugger alarms, CCTV cameras and active guards. Loot the items and put them in the cars. Police are around the city and are active against crime. You have to complete the heist stealthily and escape from the police.

Features:
-Thief simulator game has thrilling stealth missions.
-Smooth Controls
-Night Scene
-Beautiful Graphics
